title: PRICES ARE GOING UP AND THIS IS JUST THE BEGINNING, SAYS RAVI KARUNANAYAKA
content: July 05, 2010: The government has increased the prices of almost everything, but it has not increased the salaries. This is only the beginning as the government has to dance to the tune of the IMF, says parliamentarian Ravi Karunanayake. He was expressing these views addressing a public meeting yesterday to establish Janabala Mandala in…
